name: Hearts 2 Lite by GrassGames for iPad
name_original: Hearts 2 Lite by GrassGames for iPad
description:
Play against intelligent computer opponents, or easily setup network games against other iPad, iPhone, Mac or PC users, either online or in your own home!

Main Features:
- Full cross platform network play support
- Includes Standard Hearts, Spot Hearts, Omnibus and Black Maria variants
- Intelligent Computer opponents
- Play against 3 or 4 players
- 3D animation effects
- Customizable cards and backgrounds
- Smooth finger action
- Easy to see cards
